Amer Fort

This Amer Fort was really amazing. Old art and craft,natural beauty,looks of fort all are very wonderful.I was very happy to see it.

explore

Nahargarh Fort

It was a beautiful place with lovely wax museum magic show puppet show sheesh mahal Worth to visit this place for all.I was very happy to see it.

explore

India Gate

Overall a must visit place in Delhi. Avoid to go on weekends and prefer to go here on weekdays for a good experience. Overall great experience.

explore

Nature

Being in nature, or even viewing scenes of nature, reduces anger, fear, and stress and increases pleasant feelings. Exposure to nature not only makes you feel better emotionally, it contributes to your physical wellbeing, reducing blood pressure, heart rate, muscle tension, and the production of stress hormones.

explore

Patrika Gate

This is probably the most colourful I have ever seen. It is a standalone structure with several arches. The decorations and colours under the are a marvel. This place is selfie obsessed persons god sent. You can speed hours taking phots from all different angles and they will all look different.

explore
